summary: Frontend-only testing of Alt Tracker major updates at /alt-tracker. All 15 feature requirements verified and passing. Tested title rename, Add Company button, colored category badges, year selector, financial columns (Revenue/Gross Margin/EBITDA with INR format and YoY growth), min/max filters, type multi-select filter, date filters, and AI chat bar.
seed_data_creation: N/A - all data is hardcoded in companiesAlt.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Alt-tracker fully updated with Company Tracker title, Add Company button, colored category badges, year selector (FY22-FY25), financial columns (Revenue/Gross Margin/EBITDA) with INR format and YoY growth boxes, min/max filters for all financial columns, Last Interaction Type column with multi-select dropdown (All/Email/Meeting/Call), date From/To filters, and AI chat bar with rotating placeholder showing colored sector badges and gray column-header badges.

tests_passed.2_add_company_button_present_and_works: PASSED - Add Company button visible and opens modal with Company Name + Website URL fields
tests_passed.3_category_badges_are_colored: PASSED - Category badges have colored backgrounds matching sector colors (e.g., Telemedicine=pink, Marketplace=orange, K-12 Education=purple)
tests_passed.4_annual_data_year_selector: PASSED - Year selector dropdown with FY22, FY23, FY24, FY25 options visible in Annual Data header
tests_passed.5_revenue_column_inr_format: PASSED - Revenue shows values in INR format (e.g., '₹520 Cr') with YoY growth % in green/red box
tests_passed.6_gross_margin_column: PASSED - Gross Margin shows percentage values with growth box
tests_passed.7_ebitda_column: PASSED - EBITDA shows INR values with growth box (including negative values like '₹-42 Cr')
tests_passed.8_revenue_min_max_filters: PASSED - Revenue has 4 filter inputs: Value Min/Max + Growth % Min/Max
tests_passed.9_gross_margin_filters: PASSED - Gross Margin has 4 filter inputs for value and growth
tests_passed.10_ebitda_filters: PASSED - EBITDA has 4 filter inputs for value and growth
tests_passed.11_year_selector_updates_data: PASSED - Changing year from FY25 to FY22 changed revenue from ₹520 Cr to ₹214 Cr
tests_passed.12_interaction_type_renamed: PASSED - Column shows 'Last Interaction Type' (not just 'Type')
tests_passed.13_type_multi_select_filter: PASSED - Multi-select dropdown with checkboxes for All/Email/Meeting/Call, filtering works (selected Email shows 10 of 30 companies)
tests_passed.14_date_filter_inputs: PASSED - Last Interaction column has From/To date filter inputs, filtering works
tests_passed.15_chat_bar_company_intelligence: PASSED - Chat bar shows 'AI-powered company intelligence' text and rotating placeholder with colored sector badges + gray column-header badges
tests_passed.16_main_tracker_still_works: PASSED - Main tracker at / shows 'Growth Equity Fund Tracker' with different layout
